text: [Music]
once the elephants
from the forest joined together and went
and searched awful to another place
while the elephants were traveling many
mice got killed under their feet so all
the mice held a meeting they decided to
meet the head of the elephants to convey
their fear and to bring a solution to
this problem the chief of the mice stood
in front of the elephants who revoking
majestically who is blocking our path if
you want to live run away from here
don't get angry
you really oblivion throughout the world
I haven't come to disturb your journey
by blocking your vein I've come to tell
about a fear of death many of our group
mates died under your feet so if you can
change the direction of your journey we
will be very happy can you please do it
I pity you all our aim is not to destroy
you all we don't mind changing our
direction don't worry we will not bother
you in anything thank you we are very
grateful to you instead of making fun of
us we have accepted our request in
return they'll help you when the need
arises okay see you come let's go
isn't it funny to hear that such tiny
mice are going to help charge antic
animals like us one day as usual the
elephant's went to have their path in
the lake they were caught and expectedly
in the hunters net their trumpeting
echoed throughout the forest on hearing
this noise the mice knew that the
elephant's lair in danger so all the
mice ran towards the direction from
where the sound came the mice understood
the suffering of the elephants and bit
and told the net with their sharp teeth
and freed the elephants the elephants
thanked the mice for their help by
shaking their trunks the mice sat on the
elephant's back and played happily once
upon a time there was a royal elephant
that used to reside in the premises of
the king's palace the elephant was very
dear to the king so he was scared well
fed and well treated
there was a dog who used to live in the
neighborhood of the elephant shed he was
very weak and skinny he was always
fascinated by the smell of the rich
sweet rice being fed to the Royal
elephant one day the dog could not
resist a room of the rice and somehow he
sneaked into the elephant's shed
he ate the sweet rice that fell from the
elephants mode
he liked the rice so much he started
coming daily to eat the rice for this
the huge elephant didn't notice the
small dog as he was busy in enjoying the
delicious food gradually the dog became
bigger and stronger by eating such rich
food he came under the notice of the
elephant the elephant used to enjoy the
company of the dog and started sharing
his food with him both of them also
started sharing time with each other and
soon they made good friends they ate
together slept together and played
together it didn't take long when
neither of them was happy without the
other they became great friends and
didn't want to get separated from each
other then one day a man saw the dog and
asked the elephant keeper I want to buy
this dog what prize do you seek for the
dog the elephant keeper didn't own the
dog still he sold the dog and extracted
some of money out of this deal
the man took the dog to his home village
which was quiet far away the Kings
elephant became very sad after this
incident he missed his friend a lot and
started neglecting everything he didn't
want to do anything without his dear
friend
so stop eating drinking and even bathing
ultimately the elephant keeper reported
this to the king however he didn't tell
anything about the dog the king had a
wise minister who was known for his
understanding of animals at once the
king asked the minister go to the
elephant shed and find out the reason
for the elephant's condition
the intelligent Minister went to the
elephant shed and found the elephant in
fairy Saturn he loops the elephant all
over and asked the elephant people there
is nothing wrong with this elephant's
body then why does he look so sad
I think this elephant is grief-stricken
possibly due to the loss of a dear
friend do you know if this elephant
shared a close friendship with anyone
there was a dog who used to eat sleep
and play the elephant
he has been taken by a stranger three
days ago
where is the dog I don't know your
majesty as per my opinion the Royal
elephant is not sick but he is lonesome
without skia friend the dog do you know
where the dog is elephant keeper has
informed it a stranger took him away and
he didn't know about his whereabouts how
can we bring back my elephant's friend
and make him happy again
Your Majesty make a declaration that
whoever has the dog that used to live at
the Royal elephant shed will be
penalized
[Music]
attention everybody attention everybody
whoever has the dog that used to live at
the Royal elephant shed will be
penalized this is the King's order the
King did the same and the man who took
the dog instantly turned him loose when
he heard the proclamation when the dog
was free he ran back as fast as he could
to reach the elephant's shed the
elephant was so delighted to see the dog
that he picked his friend with his trunk
and made him sit on his head the dog
failed stay while the elephant's eyes
sparkled with happiness
the king was contented to see the happy
elephant once again he also ordered the
minister for his wise judgement both the
elephant and the dog lived happily ever
after
[Music]
you
